verses.t: Praise{H1984} Lordye the {H3050}. Sing{H7891} Lordunto the {H3068} a new{H2319} song{H7892}, and his praise{H8416} in the congregation{H6951} of saints{H2623}.Praise…: Heb. Hallelujah
Let Israel{H3478} rejoice{H8055} in him that made{H6213} him: let the children{H1121} of Zion{H6726} be joyful{H1523} in their King{H4428}.in him…: Heb. in his Makers
Let them praise{H1984} his name{H8034} in the dance{H4234}: let them sing praises{H2167} unto him with the timbrel{H8596} and harp{H3658}.in…: or, with the pipe
LordFor the {H3068} taketh pleasure{H7521} in his people{H5971}: he will beautify{H6286} the meek{H6035} with salvation{H3444}.
Let the saints{H2623} be joyful{H5937} in glory{H3519}: let them sing aloud{H7442} upon their beds{H4904}.
Let the high{H7319} praises of God{H410} be in their mouth{H1627}, and a twoedged{H6374} sword{H2719} in their hand{H3027};mouth: Heb. throat
To execute{H6213} vengeance{H5360} upon the heathen{H1471}, and punishments{H8433} upon the people{H3816};
To bind{H631} their kings{H4428} with chains{H2131}, and their nobles{H3513} with fetters{H3525} of iron{H1270};
To execute{H6213} upon them the judgment{H4941} written{H3789}: this honour{H1926} have all his saints{H2623}. Praise{H1984} Lordye the {H3050}.
